metadata.title: USN-4552-1 -- Pam-python vulnerability
metadata.description: Malte Kraus discovered that Pam-python mishandled certain environment variables. A local attacker could potentially use this vulnerability to execute programs as root.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-4552-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  libpam-python - 1.0.6-1.1+deb10u1build0.18.04.1 No subscription required
